trans-unit.source: To use Memcached, you must install the Memcache PECL extension on your server.

trans-unit.source: To use Xcache, you must install the Xcache extension on your server.

trans-unit.source: To use Xcache, you must configure "xcache.var_size" for the Xcache extension (recommended value 16M to 64M).

trans-unit.source: To avoid operating problems, please use an Apache server.
trans-unit.target: To avoid operating problems, please use an Apache server.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow authentication of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow authentication of PrestaShop's webservice.

trans-unit.target: We could not check to see if basic authentication and rewrite extensions have been activated. Please manually check if they've been activated in order to use the PrestaShop webservice.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
trans-unit.target: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.

trans-unit.target: Update your PHP version.

trans-unit.target: Configure your server to allow file uploads.

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer before creating a new backup
trans-unit.target: Disclaimer before creating a new backup

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop is open-source software. You are using it at your own risk under the license agreement.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop is open-source software. You are using it at your own risk under the license agreement.

trans-unit.source: You should back up your data on a regular basis (both files and database).
trans-unit.target: You should back up your data on a regular basis (both files and database).

trans-unit.source: This function only backs up your database, not your files.
trans-unit.target: This function only backs up your database, not your files.

trans-unit.source: By default, your existing database tables will be dropped during the backup recovery (see "Backup options" below).
trans-unit.target: By default, your existing database tables will be dropped during the backup recovery (see "Backup options" below).

trans-unit.source: Always verify the quality and integrity of your backup files!
trans-unit.target: Always verify the quality and integrity of your backup files!

trans-unit.source: Always verify that your backup files are complete, up-to-date and valid, even if you had a success message appear during the backup process.
trans-unit.target: Always verify that your backup files are complete, up-to-date and valid, even if you had a success message appear during the backup process.

trans-unit.source: Always check your data.
trans-unit.target: Always check your data.

trans-unit.source: Never restore a backup on a live site.
trans-unit.target: Never restore a backup on a live site.

trans-unit.source: I have read the disclaimer. Please create a new backup.
trans-unit.target: I have read the disclaimer. Please create a new backup.

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop is not responsible for your database, its backups and/or recovery.
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop is not responsible for your database, its backups and/or recovery.

trans-unit.source: How to restore a database backup
trans-unit.target: How to restore a database backup

trans-unit.source: If you need to restore a database backup, we invite you to subscribe to a [1][2]technical support plan[/2][/1].
trans-unit.target: If you need to restore a database backup, we invite you to subscribe to a [1][2]technical support plan[/2][/1].

trans-unit.source: Our team will take care of restoring your database safely.
trans-unit.target: Our team will take care of restoring your database safely.

trans-unit.source: Why can't I restore it by myself?
trans-unit.target: Why can't I restore it by myself?

trans-unit.source: Your shop is hosted by PrestaShop. Although you can create backup files here below, there are core settings you cannot access for security reasons, like the database management. Thus, only our team can proceed to a restoration.
trans-unit.target: Your shop is hosted by PrestaShop. Although you can create backup files here below, there are core settings you cannot access for security reasons, like the database management. Thus, only our team can proceed to a restoration.

trans-unit.target: Beginning the download ...
